title: Old Avissawella Road or Ambathale Road via Baseline Road
details:
Prime land, 96 Perches, Clear title, Rectangle block with roads, Frontage to Gothami Road, 500 meters to Old Avissawella Road. 1Km to Baseline Road, Commercial Zone, Ideal for Housing Project/ Ware House/ Small Industry. Rs.750.000/- per Perch/ Negotiable.
Contact 0717-700123/ 0777-700123/ 0718-113332
